description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Bristol and its Environs. Historical, descriptive and scientific. [By various authors.] Published under the sanction of the Local Executive Committee of the British Association. With illustrations and maps", "Appendix" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10368.d.23." Page: 509 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1875 Publisher: Houlston & Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000477103 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
